tool_description: Microstarter is a tool to generate beatiful QR Codes
name: Microstarter-QR Code
title: Microstarter-QR Code

api_list.name: Generate A QR Code

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
To specify the style of the QR Code. The available option: 
1. classic. 
2. dotted. 
3. square. 
4. 3dsquare. 
5. roundsquare

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The width and height of the QR Code

api_list.name: Generate A QR Code As PDF File
api_list.description: Generate a QR Code as PDF File
